name: primitive-dropdown
description: Dropdown menu with items, separators, labels, icon slots, and destructive variant
postMessage:
Requires shadcn/ui setup: npx shadcn@latest init
Import: import { DropdownMenu, DropdownMenuTrigger, DropdownMenuContent, DropdownMenuItem } from '@/components/ui/dropdown'
Usage: wrap trigger in <DropdownMenuTrigger asChild> and list <DropdownMenuItem> inside <DropdownMenuContent>
